Bet on everything from local matches and races to national competitions and international tournaments. Some of the many top sports you can bet on with Rake.com include soccer, basketball, cricket, volleyball, MMA and American football. You can even place bets on e-sports.

Payment Methods: Visa, Mastercard, Google Pay, Apple Pay, Samsung Pay Cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, USDT, BNB, USDC, Dogecoin, TRX. It's essential to note that these providers conduct their own individual KYC procedures. Rake.com has no involvement in their KYC processes, nor do we earn any fees from these recommendations.

Rake_rumble_subtitle: What exactly is Rake Rumble? It’s a massive multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) similar to World of Warcraft. It draws inspiration from a range of MMORPGs, in particular RuneScape. When you immerse yourself in the world of Rake Rumble, you can challenge other players to duels. Luck and luck alone decides the outcome, so both players have an equal chance of winning. As a Rake Rumble player, you can also go on quests, trade with other players and master a range of skills such as firemaking, fishing and woodcutting. Explore the vast, creatively designed Rake Rumble universe and enjoy a thrilling, unpredictable MMORPG gaming experience like no other.
Live_dealers_subtitle: If you want to play live dealer casino games online, look no further. At Rake.com, we have a wide variety of live casino games waiting to be played. Our collection of live games includes real-life versions of classic table games such as blackjack, roulette, baccarat and more. We also have some game shows that are fun, thrilling and potentially rewarding. What makes live dealer games so appealing is that they’re interactive. While playing, you can chat with the other players and even the croupier. These games take the online casino experience to the next level. They also bridge the gap between playing at home and playing in real-life locations with other people.
